definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to go one's own way (idiom); to act independently without asking others

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的獨行者過每天。

sentences.english: Colleen was a loner, except for her sister’s company.
sentences.chinese: 除了和妹妹做伴之外，科琳是個獨行俠。

sentences.english: I am alone and the road is very dark.
sentences.chinese: 我踽踽獨行，前路一片漆黑。

sentences.english: Therefore they shall eat the fruit of their own way, and shall be filled with their own devices.
sentences.chinese: 所以他們必要自食其果，飽嘗獨斷獨行的滋味。

sentences.english: To many Chinese, "Chinas number one sister" is a maverick.
sentences.chinese: 對許多中國人而言，“中國一姐”是一名特立獨行者。

sentences.english: Klinsi, you will never walk alone!
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼，你永遠不會獨行。

sentences.english: To many Chinese, "China's number one sister" is a maverick.
sentences.chinese: 對許多中國人而言，“中國一姐”是一位特立獨行者。

sentences.english: In the struggle to heal this nation and repair this world, we cannot walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 在完善改良我們國家的道路上，我們不能踽踽獨行。

sentences.english: They dare not break the herd, afraid of the ridicule of their neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他們怕鄰居譏笑，不敢獨斷獨行。

sentences.english: But Abaddon was always one apart.
sentences.chinese: 但是亞巴頓總是特立獨行。

sentences.english: This made him something of a loner, but he didn't mind.
sentences.chinese: 蘭波成了一個獨行客，不過他並不在意。

sentences.english: Nevertheless you are in a self-assertive mood today.
sentences.chinese: 今天你的情緒會比較獨斷獨行。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.
sentences.chinese: 喵？好吧，如果你非走不可。再會囉，夜間獨行客。

sentences.english: Romance is a snowy evening you walk back home alone with creaking footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫是飛雪的黃昏踏雪而歸踽踽獨行。

sentences.english: The mechanism of salt tolerance and universal stress resistance in Lepidium latifolium.
sentences.chinese: 大葉獨行菜耐鹽及廣譜抗逆性的基礎機理研究。

definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to rush/to charge/to dash/to break through/to temper oneself (through battling hardships)
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to fulfill one's desire/to find sth satisfactory
